title: Dark Drones & Soundscapes
description: The Dark Drones & Soundscapes Pack contains massive,  disturbing, distorted and creepy drone soundscapes perfect for  dystopian, post-apocalyptic and spooky horror scenes. The Dark Drones & Soundscapes Pack includes twenty different creepy soundscapes.
longDescription:
Any sound design project that calls for an eerie and menacing atmosphere will benefit tremendously from the addition of these powerful and sinister drone sound effects. The collection includes a wide range of tonal and atonal sounds, all of which are certain to impart a sense of melancholy and despondency upon your composition. These sound effects are sufficiently adaptable that they can be utilized in a wide variety of contexts, including but not limited to horror movies, thrillers, science fiction projects, ambient music, and drone pieces.


The sound effects have been developed to be ready to use as soon as the package is opened; yet, they also have the potential to be utilized as building blocks for even more inventive sound design. These sounds, which come in a variety of timbres and textures, are ideal for layering and altering in order to create soundscapes that are one of a kind and interesting to listen to. They have the potential to be utilized in the production of music, sound art, and a variety of other creative endeavors in addition to their application in movies, video games, and other forms of media projects.


This collection of drone sound effects is a valuable resource that will enhance your sound design toolkit and give you the tools to create truly immersive and captivating audio landscapes. Whether you are a professional sound designer or just starting out in the field, this collection of drone sound effects is a great resource to have at your disposal.


DEMO SOUNDS

Minutes of audio provided: 77 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: Single user license, royalty-free
